data.title: McMurry University Athletics
data.meta_description: Paul DavisThrows  - CAREER: A total of eight all-America honors ... Holds three McM records: outdoor shot (69’ 0 3/4”), discus (180’ 9”) and indoor shot (65' 3 1/4”)
data.text:
2014 Men's Track & Field Roster

Choose a Player:

Paul Davis

Position Throws

Class Senior

Hometown Lubbock, Texas

Highschool Coronado H.S.

Bio

Historical

Biography

CAREER: A total of eight all-America honors ... Holds three McM records: outdoor shot (69’ 0 3/4”), discus (180’ 9”) and indoor shot (65' 3 1/4”) ... 2014 INDOOR: USTFCCCA national Co-Athlete of the Week (2/2/14) ... 3x NCCAA national Athlete of the Week (1/21, 1/28, 2/2) ... 2x Lone Star Conference field event "Athlete of the Week" (1/28 and 2/2) ... Won the Air Force Collegiate Open (63' 2 3/4") ... Set McM indoor shot record by winning Texas Tech Masked Rider Open (1/30/14) with a heave of 65' 3 1/4" ... Set McM indoor record with a toss of 62' 10" at Kansas Jayhawk Classic (1/26/14) ... 2013 OUTDOOR: Placed fifth in the nation at the USA Track & Field Outdoor Championships (the top collegiate competitor in the field) in Des Moines, Iowa … Season-best mark of 69’ 0 3/4” at the USATF Southwestern Association Open and Masters Championships (Coppell, Texas) … NCCAA champion in both the shot put and discus … NCCAA field events “Outstanding Performer” award … Set NCCAA shot record (64’ 6 1/2”) … Third in shot put at prestigious Texas Relays … In 11 shot competitions, had nine first place finishes … Set McM shot record four times during the course of the season … Eclipsed 60 feet in shot put in all 11 meets … After the Heartland/McMurry Invitational on April 19, had the nation’s leading throw (67’ 4 1/4”) at any collegiate level … Was featured in the May 6 issue of Sports Illustrated in the “Faces in the Crowd” section … In addition to the NCCAA meet, he also won discus at Angelo State Relays with an McM record toss of 180’ 9” … Won the hammer at the Hardin-Simmons Invitational and the War Hawk Classic … Two-time NCCAA “Athlete of the Week” (3/26/13 & 4/22/13) and one USATF NCAA II National “Athlete of the Week” award (4/22/13) … 2013 INDOOR: Participated in the USA Track & Field Indoor Championships in Albuquerque, N.M. … Won the NCCAA championship in the shot put with an NCCAA and McM record, and indoor best, mark of 62’ 1” … Set McM indoor shot record three times … Also an NCCAA All-American in weight throw with a third place … NCCAA “Athlete of the Week” (1/29/13) ... 2012 OUTDOOR: NCAA III national champion in shot put (60’ 10 1/2”) ... His win clinched the team title for War Hawks ... Also qualified for NCAA III meet in the discus ... American Southwest Conference Field Events “Outstanding Performer” award ... ASC champ in shot with league-record toss of 59’ 7 1/2” ... Also second in ASC in discus and third in hammer ... McM school record heave of 62’ 8 1/2” in shot at the Trinity “Last Stand” for the nation’s top throw at DIII ... Davis surpassed 60-foot barrier four times in competitions (Hardin-Simmons Invitational, Texas Tech Open, Trinity “Last Stand” and NCAA championships, winning all four) ... Set McM discus record with a toss of 170’ 1”, also at Hardin-Simmons meet ... 3x ASC “Athlete of the Week” ... ASC all-conference ... 2012 INDOOR: All-American with a 4th place finish in shot ... Set McM indoor shot record with a toss of 59’ 7 1/2” at the University of Arkansas ... 2011 OUTDOOR: NCAA III All-American with a third place finish in the shot put ... Won ASC shot and discus ... ASC all-conference ... ASC “Freshman of the Year” ... 2011 INDOOR: NCAA III All-American with an eight place finish in the shot put.

RECORDS CURRENTLY HELD BY DAVIS:

McMurry University Indoor Shot Put: 65' 3 1/4" (at Texas Tech Masked Rider Open, 2014)

McMurry University Outdoor Shot Put: 69' 0 3/4" (USATF Sectional, 2013)

McMurry University Discus: 180 9" (at Angelo State, 2013)

NCCAA Indoor Shot Put: 62' 1" (at Marion, Ind., 2013)

NCCAA Outdoor Shot Put: 64' 6 1/2" (at Joliet, Ill., 2013)

Lone Star Conference Indoor Shot Put (overall): 65' 3 1/4" (at Texas Tech Masked Rider Open, 2014)

American Southwest Conference Outdoor Shot Put: 59' 7 1/2" (at Misissippi Coll., 2012)

PAUL DAVIS – Outdoor marks since first surpassing the 60-foot barrier

* Denotes broke McM outdoor school record

March 25, 2012 (first) Hardin-Simmons Invitational 60’ 6 ¾” March 31, 2012 Texas Relays 59’ 3” April 5, 2012 Angelo State Relays 57’ 10 ½” April 14, 2012 Texas Tech Open 60’ 2” April 21, 2012 Longhorn Invitational 59’ 10 ½” April 27, 2012 ASC Championships 59’ 7 ¼” May 13, 2012 Trinity “Last Chance” * 62’ 8 ½” May 26, 2012 NCAA III Championships 60’ 10 ½” March 7, 2013 Tarleton State Invitational * 63’ 6” March 22, 2013 McMurry War Hawk Relays 60’ 9 ½” March 29, 2013 Texas Relays * 63’ 10 ¼” April 6, 2013 Angelo State Relays 63’ 6 ¾” April 13, 2013 Hardin-Simmons Invitational 63’ 0 ¼” April 19, 2013 Heartland/McMurry Invitational *67’ 4 ¼” May 3, 2013 NCCAA Championships 64’ 6 ½” May 8, 2013 ACU Jackson Twilight 62’ 10 ½” May 12, 2013 Incarnate Word “Last Chance” 63’ 1 ¼” May 25, 2013 USATF Southwestern Assoc. Championships *69’ 0 ¾” June 23, 2013 USA Track & Field Outdoor Championships 65’ 4”

PAUL DAVIS – Indoor marks since first breaking the school record

* Denotes broke McM indoor school record

March 2, 2012 (first) U. of Arkansas *59' 7 ½” March 10, 2012 NCAA III Indoor Championships 57' 7" Jan. 22, 2013 Texas Tech Open *59' 10 ½” Jan. 25, 2013 Jayhawk Classic *61' 9 1/4” Feb. 2, 2013 Texas Tech Red Raider Open 58' 8 1/2" Feb. 16, 2013 NCCAA Championships *62' 1" March 3, 2013 USA Track & Field Indoor Championships FOUL Jan. 17, 2014 Texas Tech Open 61' 4 3/4" Jan. 24, 2014 Kansas Jayhawk Classic *62' 10" Jan. 31, 2014 Texas Tech Masked Rider Open *65' 3 1/4" Feb. 7, 2014 Armory Collegiate Invitational FOUL Feb. 15, 2014 Air Force Collegiate Open 63' 2 3/4"
